title: simpleRaw - Oehlenschlaegersgade
typeOfFood: Vegan, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Fusion
description: Established in 2010, this vegan and raw food cafe and take away offers a large range of delectable fresh foods, juices, and products to take home. The specialty is sandwich and chocolate mousse. Free Wi-Fi, plays lounge music in a cozy sitting area. Kitchen stops 30 minutes before closing. In June 2015 simpleRaw opened its 2nd and larger location on Grabrodretorv in Copenhagen.
